p: Other than chromosome protection, TRF1 also plays a critical role in sister telomere cohesion ( 21, 22), DNA damage responses ( 23, 24), telomere transcription, and replication ( 25â€“29). Replication machinery encounters significant challenges at telomeres due to the TTAGGG repeats, which resemble fragile sites ( 27). TRF1 is essential for efficient replication by recruiting helicase and shelterin repressor to solve TTAGGG repeat-associated replication issues ( 28, 29). However, TRF1 dynamics in telomere compaction and telomeric fork movement remains elusive.
